analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1135-1160):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1148-1152)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1153-1157)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1148-1152)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1153-1157)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1135-1160) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1135-1160) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#652-667):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#663)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#664-667)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#493-549):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#500-513)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#516-520)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#538-539)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#535-536)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#493-549):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#500-513)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#516-520)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#540-542)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#541-542)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1189-1205) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#1203-1204)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#449-481):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#477)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#479-481)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#465-467)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#475)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#493-549):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#500-513)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#516-520)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#527-532)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#525)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#532-534)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#566-584):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#571-573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#576-577)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#577-581)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#575)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#574-575)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#804-835) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#823-835)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#828-835)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#346-347)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#297)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xfb7c9bd2045cd9129839a70c67aabb0925b1fbe8.sol#327)
